rules.description: Right control by holding semicolon key. Regular semicolon when pressed alone
Mouse Keys Mode v4 (rev 1)
Map Left Control + Left Command + J to return
Map Left Control + Left Command +  semicolon to delete
Caps Lock's: Esc when alone, LCMD+LCtrl when holded, LCtrl when double tap and holded
Control key by holding tab key. Regular tab key when pressed alone
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Vi Mode [S as Trigger Key]
Change left command key to control + option if pressed with other keys
Map Hyper Key + ; to delete
Map Hyper + U to acute accent
Map Hyper + I to tilde accent
Map Hyper + O to circunflex accent
Map Hyper + P to grave accent
Map Hyper + ' to cedilla
Map Ctrl + Option + Q to Command + W
Map Ctrl + Shift + Option + Q to Command + Q
Map Hyper + J to return
Change Caps Lock to Hyper Key. (Post Esc key when pressed alone)
Change return to right control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Vi Mode [D as Trigger Key] (recommended)
Map Hyper + , to vk_none (no key, to avoid System Diagnostics)
Map Hyper + . to vk_none (no key, to avoid System Diagnostics)
Semicolon modifier by holding ; key. Regular ; when pressed alone
